data.name: Sleep Paralysis: The Uncanny Valley Demo
data.detailed_description: This Demo will put you into the every day life of Thomas. He is going about his usual business until something happens, that might change the course of his life. Not that he knew this at the time...
data.about_the_game: This Demo will put you into the every day life of Thomas. He is going about his usual business until something happens, that might change the course of his life. Not that he knew this at the time...
data.short_description: In this Demo you're going about your daily life, but something goes terribly wrong. Your goal is to get your life back to normal and you will notice that sometimes trying is not necesarily improving the situation...

content_descriptors.notes: This Game contains Psychological Horror Elements. This Game also builds tension with information, which might be hard to distinguish from reality.
